TopicTitle: Is there a mod that will let engineers repair solar panels?

Articles.Content: Kinda silly that they can repair wheels and landing gear, but not solar panels, especially considering how easily and often they break compared to the gear.
Not as far as I know. But an engineer can replace them with KIS/KAS.
Wasn't there a bug in you put a broke one in a kis/kas box and get it back out it would be fixed ?

Wasn't there a bug in you put a broke one in a kis/kas box and get it back out it would be fixed ?

Last I checked, you can't pick up a broken one with KIS; it doesn't have a collider.

You can attach a new one, though.
